text: Abrosimovo () is a rural locality (a village) in Posyolok Nikologory, Vyaznikovsky District, Vladimir Oblast, Russia. The population was 8 as of 2010. == Geography == The village is located 9 km west from Nikologory and 30 km south-west from Vyazniki. == References == Category:Rural localities in Vyaznikovsky District
title: Abrosimovo, Vyaznikovsky District, Vladimir Oblast
